alert.note: Alert for Rockdale (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 11:29AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Honey Creek at GA 212 near Conyers affecting Rockdale County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Honey Creek at GA 212 near Conyers. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding will occur in portions of the woodlands and fields near the creek upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia Highway 212 or Scott Highway. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:16 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:16 AM EST Tuesday was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.5 feet on 07/01/2003. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1130 PM EST.
